body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Henry Robinson and the customer's name is Christina Young.  The conversation is about a random business (a Bar ) and is a conversation about typical situation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Tech Solutions. My name is Alex. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, I'm looking to inquire about your repair services.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. Could I please get your email address so I can pull up your records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Could you also provide me with your contact number, just in case we need to reach out to you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Absolutely, my number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Alright, I have all the information I need. Thank you for your time, Sarah. We will get back to you shortly regarding your inquiry.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Alex. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Have a wonderful day, Sarah. Goodbye!

body.transcript_summary: The customer called to report an issue with their recent purchase which arrived damaged. They expressed their frustration about the inconvenience and asked for a replacement or a refund. The purpose of the call was to resolve the issue with the damaged product. The agent apologized for the issue, provided clear instructions on how to return the item, and assured the customer that a replacement would be sent promptly.
body.call_purpose: To resolve an issue with a damaged product received by the customer.

vendor_schema.prompt:
Summarize this transcript in a few sentences, identify the purpose of the call and then indicate if there is a clear frustration expressed by 
the customer and if this was a conversation between two people or if someone left a message, and if agent was helpful?
